mapper.select:
SELECT count(1) FROM CMPY_TB WHERE 1 = 1
AND CMPY_CODE = #{item.searchWord}
and IFNULL(FN_MEM_NAME(CMPY_TB.INS_MEM_ID), '') like concat('%',#{item.searchWord},'%')
AND cmpy_name like concat('%',#{item.searchWord},'%')
AND cmpy_phone like concat('%',replace(#{item.searchWord},'-',''),'%')
AND IFNULL(type_code,'9999') = #{item.searchWord}
and date_format(CMPY_TB.ins_dt, '%Y%m%d') between date_format(#{item.startDate}, '%Y%m%d') and date_format(#{item.endDate}, '%Y%m%d')
mapper.insert:
SELECT CMPY_SEQ cmpySeq FROM CMPY_TB WHERE CMPY_CODE = #{cmpyCode} AND CMPY_NAME = TRIM(#{cmpyName})
INSERT INTO CMPY_TB ( CMPY_SEQ, CMPY_CODE, CMPY_NAME, ENG_NAME, TYPE_CODE, APPL_TYPE, CMPY_PHONE, CMPY_FAX, CMPNY_IDNTF, ETC_ID, BSNS_RGNMB, CRPRT_RGNMB, CNTRY_CODE, HOMEPAGE, RPRSN, ENG_RPRSN, RSDNT_RGNMB, ADDR, ENG_ADDR, MEMO, INS_MEM_ID, UDT_MEM_ID ) VALUES ( IF(#{cmpySeq}=0,(SELECT IFNULL(MAX(seq.CMPY_SEQ)+1,1) cmpySeq FROM CMPY_TB seq WHERE CMPY_CODE = #{cmpyCode}), #{cmpySeq}), #{cmpyCode}, TRIM(#{cmpyName}), #{engName}, #{typeCode}, #{applType}, #{cmpyPhone}, #{cmpyFax}, #{cmpnyIdntf}, #{etcId}, #{bsnsRgnmb}, #{crprtRgnmb}, #{cntryCode}, #{homepage}, #{rprsn}, #{engRprsn}, #{rsdntRgnmb}, #{addr}, #{engAddr}, #{memo}, #{insMemId}, #{udtMemId} ) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE CMPY_NAME = TRIM(#{cmpyName}), ENG_NAME = #{engName}, TYPE_CODE = #{typeCode}, APPL_TYPE = #{applType}, CMPY_PHONE = #{cmpyPhone}, CMPY_FAX = #{cmpyFax}, CMPNY_IDNTF = #{cmpnyIdntf}, ETC_ID = #{etcId}, BSNS_RGNMB = #{bsnsRgnmb}, CRPRT_RGNMB = #{crprtRgnmb}, CNTRY_CODE = #{cntryCode}, HOMEPAGE = #{homepage}, RPRSN = #{rprsn}, ENG_RPRSN = #{engRprsn}, RSDNT_RGNMB = #{rsdntRgnmb}, ADDR = #{addr}, ENG_ADDR = #{engAddr}, MEMO = #{memo}, UDT_MEM_ID = #{udtMemId}, UDT_DT = NOW(), STATE = 'U'

INSERT INTO CMPY_MNG_TB ( CMPY_SEQ, NAME, PHONE, FAX, TEL, EMAIL, DEPT, LEVEL, MEMO ) VALUES
( #{cmpySeq}, #{item.name}, replace(#{item.phone},'-',''), replace(#{item.fax},'-',''), replace(#{item.tel},'-',''), #{item.email}, #{item.dept}, #{item.level}, #{item.memo} )

update.foreach: UPDATE CMPY_MNG_TB SET NAME = #{item.name}, PHONE = replace(#{item.phone},'-',''), FAX = replace(#{item.fax},'-',''), TEL = replace(#{item.tel},'-',''), EMAIL = #{item.email}, DEPT = #{item.dept}, LEVEL = #{item.level}, MEMO = #{item.memo}, STATE = #{item.state} WHERE CMPY_MNG_SEQ = #{item.cmpyMngSeq}

mapper.select: SELECT CMPY_MNG_SEQ, NAME, PHONE, FAX, TEL, EMAIL, DEPT, LEVEL, MEMO FROM CMPY_MNG_TB WHERE 1=1 AND STATE != 'D' AND CMPY_SEQ = #{cmpySeq}

SELECT CMPY_SEQ, CMPY_CODE, CMPY_NAME, ENG_NAME, TYPE_CODE, APPL_TYPE, FN_GET_PHONE_FORMAT (CMPY_PHONE) CMPY_PHONE, FN_GET_PHONE_FORMAT (CMPY_FAX) CMPY_FAX, CMPNY_IDNTF, ETC_ID, BSNS_RGNMB, CRPRT_RGNMB, CNTRY_CODE, HOMEPAGE, RPRSN, ENG_RPRSN, RSDNT_RGNMB, ADDR, ENG_ADDR, MEMO, INS_MEM_ID, UDT_MEM_ID FROM CMPY_TB WHERE CMPY_SEQ = #{cmpySeq}

set @rownum:=0;
SELECT @rownum:=@rownum+1 as no, lst.* FROM ( SELECT lpad (CMPY_TB.cmpy_seq, 4, '0') cmpySeq, cmpy_name, ifnull (FN_CODE_NAME (type_code, 'PK'), '') type FROM CMPY_TB WHERE 1=1 AND CMPY_CODE = #{cmpyCode} AND CMPY_NAME regexp concat('[',#{cmpyName},']{2}') order by CMPY_TB.cmpy_seq ) lst order by no desc
